review: Friendly Doctor and extremely accessible. Made me feel confident and gave me hope.. Great human being

**** ****** ** *** ***** Last month we did surgery for my daughter. On the first visit he forced us to do the surgery in Apollo. But we requested to it in another hospital , which he visited there also. ** ****  ****** ******** ******* **** ** ** ** *  **** ** *** ****** ******* *** ********** We have no way. So agreed to do the surgery in Apollo spectra. Apart form insurance claim the checked 100% hike.  They charged out of the claim. That we didn't aware of this. ********** ****  **** ********** This is not necessary for my daughter. End of the day we lost our insurance amount along with 100%hike cash payment.
In practo you charged 500 in hosp they got 1000.why is the confusion. In practo it was 500 in hosp they charged 1000
